price: 8. Waxaan hallignay kuwo4 ka xoog iyo qabasho badnaa, waxaana hore u tagay mataalka kuwii hore (ee la halaagay).
arabic: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: 4. Waxaa loola jeedaa gaalada ku jira Quraysh, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ahlaknā ashadda min'hum baṭshan wamaḍā mathalu al-awalīna
